Reference

Tokenizer

cmecab()

Call CMeCab tagger

igo()

Call Igo tagger

Utilities

rebuild_tagger()

Rebuild CMeCab tagger

prettify()

Prettify tokenized output

pack()

Pack prettified data.frame of tokens

ngram_tokenizer()

Ngrams tokenizer

csvutil_tokenize()

Utility for handling CSV-like string

csvutil_escape()

Utility for handling CSV-like string

csvutil_join()

Utility for handling CSV-like string

is_blank()

Check if scalars are blank

is_mecab_available()

Check if the mecab or its dynamic library is available

Gibasa: RMeCab-compatible functionalities

gibasa

Gibasa functions family

gbs_freq()

An alternative of RMeCabFreq

gbs_c()

An alternative of RMeCabC

gbs_as_tokens()

Pack prettified output as quanteda tokens

gbs_dfm()

An alternative of docDF family

gbs_collocate()

A mimic of collocate
